dublin_core.dcvalue: The rapid increase in the use of radiology and related exams and procedures has led to a concomitant increase in associated radiation risk An application for the iPhone and iPod Touch called Radiation Passport is described which provides radiation dose estimates and associated cancer risks non fatal and fatal and serves as a method by which to track an individual s cumulative exposure
Journal of the American College of Radiology : JACR
Radiation passport: an iPhone and iPod touch application to track radiation dose and estimate associated cancer risks.
